data.name: SKALD: Against the Black Priory Original Soundtrack Vol. I
data.detailed_description:
The soundtrack to SKALD: Against the Black Priory, an old-school roleplaying game that combines modern design and a fully realised narrative with authentic 8-bit looks and charms. The music was composed using the Yamaha YM2413 sound chip to create a warm, nostalgic sound that ranges from creepy ambience to shredding guitars.

The first volume features 22 tracks and offers over an hour of music composed by Romanus Surt. The second volume is expected to arrive once the game leaves Early Access.
